title: LFM New Zealand Players Platinum +
body:
Hi, I am interested in playing with skilled players from same time zone in a team atmosphere. Will intend on entering Oceanic open Ladder and possibly other tournaments. I was around D2 last year and am an NZ player.

Requirements: 
Living in New Zealand
Platinum +
Working mike
Able to train together at least 2 - 3 times a week around 6 - 10 pm. 
Positive with good attitude. 
Someone who can handle a loss.

Roles Open:
Top: Open
Jungle: Open
Mid: Open
ADC: Open
Sup: Open

replies.body: It is good amount of interest shown by players, would still like to see couple more diamond elo players still in process of gathering people.

Please add me 

I finished p3 last season solo Q and g1 in team Q

IGN: Neosinf

I can play support. Last season I was D5 and P2 on my other account. Add me :) 
Ign : OneRice or Lazyrage
